text: Ara tumi tadera mane karate jagrata yadi'o tara chila ghumanta, ara amara tadera pasa phiriye ditama dana dike o bam dike, ara tadera kukurati thaba mele rayechila prabesapathe. Tumi yadi tadera hathat dekhate tabe tadera theke pichana phirate palayanapara haye, ara tumi niscaya'i tadera karane bhaye bihala hate.
